name: Trapdoors
description: Like doors, but for your ceilings.

name: Wooden trapdoor
description: This small wooden door can be used to secure hatches.

name: Adobe trapdoor DLC
description: This adobe slab can be used to secure hatches.

name: Reinforced trapdoor
description: This small reinforced door can be used to secure hatches.

name: Giant adobe trapdoor DLC
description: A large adobe gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Giant Reinforced Trapdoor
description: A large reinforced ceiling gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Metal trapdoor
description: This metal-plated concrete slab can be used to secure hatches.

name: Giant Metal Trapdoor
description: A large reinforced ceiling gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep most dinosaurs in or out.
